name: Eva Sokolovsky
title: Frontend Developer
summary:
With over 10 years in web development, I bring expertise in HTML5, CSS,
and the SASS preprocessor, specializing in responsive, cross-browser, and accessible design with a strong focus on user experience.

animations).

collaboration.

Optimize website performance and implement automated testing with Cypress.
